item.title: .NET Platform Standard and the magic of "imports"
item.description: In case you missed it, .NET Core RC2 has been released by Microsoft last week along with ASP.NET Core RC2 and a preview of the tooling. Lots of exciting new stuff that I highly encourage checking out. Now that RC2 is out there I guess a lot more people will be checking it out and playing with it and thereâ€™s one topic that seems to confuse a lot of people.
